mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO stay_tour_restaur_fest (strf_id, category, title, lat, lng, address, location_id, post, tell, start_at, end_at, `open`, `close`, rest_date, `explain`, detail, busi_num) VALUES
(#{item.strfId}, #{item.category}, #{item.title}, #{item.lat}, #{item.lng}, #{item.address}, #{item.locationId}, #{item.post}, #{item.tell}, #{item.startAt}, #{item.endAt}, #{item.open}, #{item.close}, #{item.restDate}, #{item.explain}, #{item.detail}, #{item.busiNum})
